column5: Hi, Fished Vernon for a few days this past weekend. Got this beauty just before dark on a 5" Chugbug.  Mark

Wow, that's a tank! I fished Lake Vernon once years ago and we caught a bunch of 5-6 pounders along with some nice smallies... some of the locals told us there were some giants to be had, and you just proved it!
That really IS a beauty! Congrats to you and thank you for sharing.
Beauty Fish - Man, that thing is FAT!
Great catch, must have been a wicked moment!
nice fish, that musta been exciting
Man that thing is HUGE....that fish would eat the stuff I usually catch for Breakfast.
Very very nice!!! I've always heard good things about the pike in Vernon....that's some serious proof right there!
its been a while since i have anything from vernon.  Great pike good to hear the fishing is still strong there  cheers!
